page.title: 18TRANSPORT - SULLINGTON
page.content: Public transport in the Sullington area is provided by the Southdown motor company. The A24 and A283 roads provide routes for regular local bus services linking town and village, namely the Service 202 Worthing to Horsham, and the Service 201 Worthing to Storrington. The latter does not run on Sundays. There are also two limited stop services, Service 739 from Brighton to Midhurst which runs on Saturdays only and Service 710 from Brighton to Salisbury on Tuesdays only. Because of the limited service in the area most families have a car.
